医疗保险患者经常在支持治疗的情况下接受积极的治疗根据一项分析Medicare记录的研究，许多患有晚期癌症的医疗保险患者以牺牲支持性护理为代价接受了潜在的积极治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/20250222/medicare-patients-with-cancer-cancer-often-receive-aggressive-grestratment-warteatment-warteatment-vorevortive-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/medicare-patients-with-cancer-often-receive-receive-aggressive-warteatment-warteatment-warteatment-vorevortive-pportive-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be5ead76-dab6-42ef-9EB1-9EB1-396936149E10 Sat, 22 Feb 2025 14:18:17 -0500 Medicare patients with cancer often receive aggressive treatment over supportive care

推进显微镜以捕获3D中的蛋白质取向俗话说，两个人比一个人好，有时是两种乐器，巧妙地重新融合了，可以实现这一壮举。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/advancing-microscopy-to-capture-protein-entientation-in-eientation-in-3d.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/advancing-microscopy-to-capture-protein-entientation-in-erientation-in-3d.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=399e9a81-ec12-46d9-8b73-3a9603142f5f Sat, 22 Feb 2025 14:05:06 -0500 Advancing microscopy to capture protein orientation in 3D
干扰素伽玛的持久性为长期和潜在疗法提供了线索SARS-COV-2触发与疲劳，肌肉疼痛和抑郁有关的抗病毒蛋白IFN-γ的产生。新的研究表明，在长期的共同患者中，IFN-y产生一直存在直到症状改善，突出了潜在的生物标志物和疗法的靶标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/interferon-gamma-persistence-cressces-clues-clues-clues-covid-covid-and-potential-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/20250222/interferon-gamma-persistence offers-clues-clues-to-covid-covid-and-potential-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7C456575-C166-4B55-AB04-FF1BC9359A2B Sat, 22 Feb 2025 13:56:00 -0500 Interferon gamma persistence offers clues to Long COVID and potential therapies

Eth Zurich团队发现微泡药物的机制苏黎世ETH研究人员已经调查了微小的气泡如何使用超声以靶向方式将药物输送到细胞中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/eth-zurich-team-uncovers-mechanism-behind-microbubble-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/eth-zurich-team-uncovers-mechanism-behind-microbubble-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c91b4ad1-0583-450c-a11f-c47361568e1e Sat, 22 Feb 2025 13:40:00 -0500 ETH Zurich team uncovers mechanism behind microbubble drug delivery
新的干预有助于减少超处的食物摄入量并改善健康状况大多数饮食计划旨在帮助人们实现体重减轻或遵守美国营养指南，目前尚未提及超系统的食品（UPFS）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/new-inew-inew-new-helps-helps-reduce-ultra-process-food-food-intake-intake-intake-and-improve-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/new-inew-inew-intervention-helps-reduce-reduce-ultra-process-food-food-intake-intake-intake-ink-inmprove-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa433f60-6dac-4C34-95E4-A7290304C43A Sat, 22 Feb 2025 13:32:00 -0500 New intervention helps reduce ultra-processed food intake and improve health
Zika病毒劫持隧穿机理以感染胎盘细胞怀孕中寨卡病毒感染会导致神经系统疾病，胎儿异常和胎儿死亡。到目前为止，该病毒如何设法越过胎盘，从而培育了发育中的胎儿并构成了对可能损害胎儿的微生物和化学物质的强烈障碍，但尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/zika-virus-hijacks-tunneling-mechanisl-mechanics-to-infect-placental-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/zika-virus-hijacks-tunneling-mechanisl-mechanisl-to-infect-placental-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78187de3-1B8E-4714-9B37-91F5CAF26657 Sat, 22 Feb 2025 13:24:00 -0500 Zika virus hijacks tunneling mechanism to infect placental cells
研究揭示了晚期癌症患者姑息治疗的差距尽管在美国提高了临终关怀质量的巨大努力，但由美国癌症协会（ACS）研究人员领导的一项新的回顾性研究表明，近一半的晚期癌症患者在最终获得了潜在的侵略性护理。以牺牲支持护理为代价的生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/202502222/study-reveals-gaps-gaps-in-palliative-care-care-for-patients-with-advanced-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/20250222/study-reveals-gaps-gaps-in-palliative-care-care-for-patients-patients-with-advanced-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2664b46b-8220-41E1-9515-B9634BE47ADF Sat, 22 Feb 2025 13:15:00 -0500 Study reveals gaps in palliative care for patients with advanced cancer
突破方法为氟化的氧烷药物分子打开了门来自新加坡国立大学（NUS）的研究人员开创了一种新的催化转化，将环氧化物转化为氟化的氧甲烷，这是一种令人垂涎但难以杀死的药物分子类别，该药物分子逃脱了多年的合成制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/breakthrough-method-opens-door-to-fluorined-oxetane-oxetane-drug-molecules.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250222/breakthrough-method-opens-door-to-fluorined-oxetane-oxetane-drug-molecules.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02f06E5B-45D7-45D7-4FBC-BD1F-2A568789BB30 Sat, 22 Feb 2025 13:04:00 -0500 Breakthrough method opens door to fluorinated oxetane drug molecules
